title: Hawaii State Department of Health
author: Hawaii State Department
cleaned_text: HONOLULU - The Hawai'i State Department of Health (DOH) is one of 13 states to receive a $4 million federal Project Linking Actions for Unmet Needs in Children's Health (Project LAUNCH) grant, providing the state $800,000 a year for the next five years.
